bug.author: danil-tolkachev
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h5>System information (version)</denchmark-h>
OpenCV => 3.1 numpy => 1.9 and newer
<denchmark-h:h5>Detailed description</denchmark-h>
Running the python samples houghcircles.py, houghlines.py and tst_scene_render.py leads to warning like this <denchmark-code>./houghcircles.py:33: FutureWarning: comparison to `None` will result in an elementwise object comparison in the future. </denchmark-code>
